meanings.sent1: She preferred manual tasks like painting and drawing.
meanings.sent2: The manual labor of gardening kept him fit and strong.
meanings.sent3: He attempted a manual cartwheel but ended up in a heap on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her manual dexterity was evident in the intricate origami she created.
meanings.sent5: The manual work of sculpting the clay brought her a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: The manual for assembling the furniture was clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: She referred to the manual to troubleshoot the issue with her computer.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly tried to read the manual upside down to see if it made more sense.
meanings.sent4: The manual was a beacon of guidance in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: Carrying the manual with her, she felt prepared for any challenge ahead.

meanings.sent1: The manual labor required to build the house was exhausting but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the manual tasks of hiking and rock climbing.
meanings.sent3: He found a manual way to exercise by chopping wood for the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: The manual workout left her muscles pleasantly sore the next day.
meanings.sent5: The manual activities in the obstacle course tested her strength and endurance.
